subject: Investing
title: Why Diversification Works
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on Why Diversification Works.

hook.text: An investor with one stock lost 70% in a crash. Her neighbor held 500 stocks and lost only 30%.

buildup.text: Diversification spreads your money across many assets so no single failure can wipe you out.

discovery.text: Math shows that holding 30+ stocks eliminates most company-specific risk, leaving only market risk.

twist.text: Diversification doesn't prevent lossesâ€”it prevents catastrophic losses from a single bad bet.

climax.text: Nobel laureate Harry Markowitz called diversification the only 'free lunch' in investing.

punchline.text: Don't put all your eggs in one basket. It really is that simple.
